author: Harmeet Kaur, CNN
title: Gun retailers can operate in their parking lots during the pandemic, ATF says
description: The Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF) announced on Friday that federally licensed firearms businesses could carry out transactions through drive-up windows and temporary booths in their parking lots or other parts of their property.
content:
(CNN)Gun retailers operating during the coronavirus pandemic will now be able to offer curbside service.
